document_data.name: Drom
document_data.mainbody: '''Drom''' was a [[dwarf]] [[fighter]] worshiper of [[Helm]] and a member of [[Order of the Gauntlet]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Drom believed that you could fix problems with a big hammer.
document_data.History: He was the Gauntlet's delegate to help a hired adventuring party to defeat the great dragon [[Claugiyliamatar]] in [[Kryptgarden Forest]]. The objective of Drom's order was to destroy the [[Cult of the Dragon]]'s contingent without warning the [[green dragon]] and to destroy all [[undead]] raised by [[Thayan]] [[necromancer]]s.{{Cite adventurers league/Corruption in Kryptgarden|8}}
